name: Volume Tier
description: Data volume classification for scale planning, partitioning strategies, file sizing, and benchmark profiles. Ordered from smallest to largest scale.

ordered_values.label: Unknown
ordered_values.description: Volume not yet classified; must be classified before infrastructure provisioning.

ordered_values.label: Tiny
ordered_values.description: Very small datasets (≤100K rows); single-file, in-memory processing.

ordered_values.label: Small
ordered_values.description: Small datasets (≤10M rows); single-node processing, moderate file sizes.

ordered_values.label: Medium
ordered_values.description: Medium datasets (≤1B rows); partitioned storage, distributed processing beneficial.

ordered_values.label: Large
ordered_values.description: Large datasets (≤100B rows); distributed processing required, columnar formats.

ordered_values.label: Massive
ordered_values.description: Massive datasets (>100B rows); specialized infrastructure, aggressive partitioning.
